ai.summary: ACW Circular Walk 02U is a 7.1 km circular route in the UK, marketed as a short-cut variation of C02. Region is unknown; the walk traverses a mix of paths including grassy verges and formed paths with occasional gentle climbs, suitable for walkers with a moderate fitness level.
ai.terrain_summary: The route uses a mix of well-defined paths, field margins and short sections of uneven ground. Expect a few gentle ascents and descents, with some exposure to mud after rain. Surface quality ranges from compact gravel to short grassy stretches; stiles and gates may be encountered.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight hours before setting out. The walk is on open country paths with occasional road sections; carry a map or GPS, and keep a charged phone. Wear sturdy footwear, bring water and snacks, and dress for changing UK conditions. Take care on wet or uneven ground, and be mindful of others on shared paths.
recommended_gear: Map and/or GPS device (or offline map on phone)
Headlamp or flashlight (for late finishes or low light)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (approximately March to October) in the UK; can be walked year-round with extra care in winter.
